column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Successful Purchase of Apple Device,"Navigate to the home page, select Apple category, choose a product, proceed to checkout, provide shipping details, complete payment, and verify successful order completion.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on button bestChoiceHotNew
Step 4: Click on label gb
Step 5: Click on label gb
Step 6: Click on button buy
Step 7: Navigate to cart, provide checkout information, shipping address, and proceed to payment
